mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contacted_meeting (meeting_seq, application_seq, contact_time) VALUES (#{meeting_seq}, #{application_seq}, current_timestamp)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM contacted_meeting WHERE meeting_seq = #{meeting_seq} AND application_seq = #{application_seq}
SELECT EXISTS( SELECT * FROM contacted_meeting WHERE meeting_seq = #{meeting_seq} )

SELECT * FROM (SELECT meeting.meeting_seq, meeting.title, meeting.meeting_time, meeting.participants_cnt, meeting.expected_cost, meeting.activity_seq, meeting.creation_time, matching.contact_seq FROM meeting, (SELECT contacted_meeting.meeting_seq, contacted_meeting.contact_seq FROM contacted_meeting, application WHERE contacted_meeting.application_seq = application.application_seq AND application.user_id = #{user_id})as matching WHERE meeting.meeting_seq = matching.meeting_seq)as result union (SELECT meeting.meeting_seq, meeting.title, meeting.meeting_time, meeting.participants_cnt, meeting.expected_cost, meeting.activity_seq, meeting.creation_time, contacted_meeting.contact_seq FROM contacted_meeting, meeting WHERE meeting.user_id = #{user_id} AND contacted_meeting.meeting_seq = meeting.meeting_seq) ORDER BY creation_time DESC

SELECT application.contact AS guest_contact , matchmeeting.contact AS host_contact, matchmeeting.meeting_seq, application.application_seq FROM (SELECT meeting.contact, meeting.meeting_seq FROM meeting, contacted_meeting WHERE meeting.meeting_seq = contacted_meeting.meeting_seq)AS matchmeeting LEFT JOIN application ON matchmeeting.meeting_seq = application.meeting_seq WHERE matchmeeting.meeting_seq = #{meeting_seq}
